title: Look Twice before You Leap: A Rational Agent Framework for Localized Adversarial Anonymization
summary: Current LLM-based text anonymization frameworks usually rely on remote API services from powerful LLMs, which creates an inherent privacy paradox: users must disclose data to untrusted third parties for guaranteed privacy preservation. Moreover, directly migrating current solutions to local small-scale models (LSMs) offers a suboptimal solution with severe utility collapse.
